title: Half of post-game screen shows up; other half is off of screen. (Mac)
body: Half of my post-game screen shows up on my computer. The other half is off of the screen and the window cannot be dragged up to show the full screen or resized. Running on a Mac (latest OS). Does anyone have any solutions?

replies.body: That's odd!  See if[ resetting your config ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#mq2)will default your positioning on screen.  Let me know if that works for you!
